doc.field: The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts
The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts

Five editions with a manuscript appendix, bound together (1): Sacrae Symphoniae à4-16, ed. K. Hassler (Nürnberg: Kauffmann, 1601) RISM 16012 (2): Sacrarum Symphoniarum Continuatio à4-12 (Nürnberg: Kauffmann, 1600) RISM 16002 (3): Hassler: Sacri Concentus à4-12 (Augsburg: Schönigk, 1601) RISM H2328 (4): Praetorius: Magnificat à8, Motetis à8,12 (Hamburg: de Ohr, 1602) RISM P5333 (5): Gumpelzhaimer: I Sacrorum Cantionum à8 (Augsburg: Schönigk, 1601) RISM G5139 (6): Manuscript appendix of one work. Three part-books, Cantus, Tenor and Septimus, from a set, probably of twelve
The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts
